Class Account

java.lang.Object
  Account

public class Account
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to create an Account for a mobile It calculates the balance after topups and calls are made It also returns the values for the Account names and the current balance The program also has a toString method which convers the object into A string format

public int processCall(int requestedDuration)
Method is used to calculate how much has to be deducted from the balance for the call being made

Parameters:
requestedDuration - The duration which is needed to work out the cost for the duration
Returns:
The duration of the call whose limit is the current balance
